    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle rb)
      Initializes the controller after the root element has been completely processed. Configures the layout of the logs container and info grid components and sets initial constraints and padding for the user interface.
      Parameters:
      url - the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if not known
      rb - the resource bundle used to localize the root object, or null if not provided
